entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
